entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.5
entry.content:
🚀 Release: Bug Fixes & Enhancements ✅ Fixes Fixed case-sensitivity issue with username/email during login.

Restored missing Admin tab in the OIDC settings page.

Added rate limiting to Login & Signup pages using internal Nginx (not external proxy).

✨ Enhancements Added ability to quick add foods without saving to the main food library.

ChatBot now renders properly in mobile view.

⚠️ Security Warning Do NOT expose this app directly to the internet. It is still under active development, and not production-hardened. Always deploy behind Cloudflare Access, VPN, or equivalent authentication/firewall layers.

Thanks for all the feedback and support! 🙌

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.7

🥗 Calorie Goal Distribution by Meal Type You can now set percentage-based calorie goals for each meal type (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks). Includes built-in presets like Intermediate Fasting, No Snacks, and more.

⚙️ Flexible Goal Editing Options Edit your calorie goals using cascading logic (apply changes over 6 months), use preset templates, or make individual daily adjustments.

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.8
entry.content:
What's Changed 🚀 Release: Bug Fixes & Enhancements

This update brings major improvements to usability, flexibility, and authentication. Here's what's new:

🥗 Smarter Food & Exercise Logging - [x] Easily add or import food and exercise directly from the diary or food/exercise sections — no more switching between multiple tabs. - [x] Top and recent foods are now available while adding to meals and meal plans. - [x] Recent and top exercises now show up when logging exercises in the diary.

📊 Flexible Nutrient Display - [x] Customize what nutrients are shown across the app: - [x] Summary views - [x] Quick info tiles - [x] Daily goals - [x] Charts and table views - This gives you full control over the nutrient data you care about most.

🔐 Dynamic Login Management - [x] Toggle between login/password and OIDC (OpenID Connect) authentication. - [x] If OIDC is the only method enabled, the app will now auto-login via OIDC. - [x] No more manual configuration juggling — it just works based on what’s enabled.

entry.title: New release for SparkyFitness: v0.14.9
entry.content:
💧 New: Water Tracking with Your Favorite Bottle! Do you love your water bottle and actually use it every day? Me too. That's why I revamped water intake tracking — no more boring "1 glass = 250ml" nonsense.

🍼 Custom Water Containers

  • Create your own water containers (like "HydroJug 1L" or "Stanley Cup 40oz").
  • Use your preferred units (ml, oz, etc.).
  • Set a container as primary, and track your water intake based on how many bottles you drink.
  • Now your hydration log reflects your real-life habits — not generic cups. Stay hydrated, your way. 💦
